title: [命令]请问在1.12里怎样生成穿装备的怪物？在线等
author: 陈大哥哥

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
其他地方同理，就不写了，Count一定要有，有minecraft冒号就一定要写
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:redstone_block",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:command_block",Count:1}],ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:"diamond_helmet",Count:1}]}复制代码或者不要minecraft直接id:redstone_block
